definition: China Federation of Literary and Art Circles (CFLAC)/abbr. to 文聯|文联

definition: the art of the possible (Bismarck on politics)
pinyin: ke3 cao1 zuo4 de5 yi4 shu4

sentences.english: Arts and Humanities, we are told, are useless for the making of technological innovation.
sentences.chinese: 我們被教導說藝術與人文對於技術革新是無用的。

sentences.english: Art ceramic tiles add luster to the walls of your kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 藝術瓷磚，使您廚房四壁增輝。

sentences.english: Deputy Mayor He Jihua meets with principal members of Kagoshima Cultural Exchange Group.
sentences.chinese: 市長何寄華會見鹿兒島文化藝術交流團的主要成員。

sentences.english: "Emotion and molding" was very similar to the old topic of emotion and art.
sentences.chinese: “情感與造型”，似是重提了情感與藝術的老話題。

sentences.english: According to Mumford, man is free in artistic creation.
sentences.chinese: 人在藝術創作時是自由的。

sentences.english: The formation of oriental art brands.
The Folk Songs of Northern Shaanxi is the most representative artistic form ofthe Loess Culture.
sentences.chinese: 陝北民歌是黃土文化中最具代表性的藝術形式。

sentences.english: Two golden curves across the card surface add an artistic touch to the design.
sentences.chinese: 另外卡面設計以兩道金色弧線爲主題，極富藝術感。

sentences.english: The artistic achievements of Xiuruji mostly embody two aspects.
sentences.chinese: 《繡襦記》的藝術成就主要體現在兩方面。

sentences.english: Thev artist does all the active work, makes the biggest emotional investment.
sentences.chinese: 藝術家獨攬了所有的創造性工作，投入了大量的心血。

sentences.english: You swipe up and down to scroll lists of, say, tracks or artists.
sentences.chinese: 你可以上下滑動來滾動列表，比如，藝術家列表。

sentences.english: The Snow World wrote by Kawabata Yasunari is a famous masterpiece with unvarying artistic fascination.
sentences.chinese: 川端康成的《雪國》是一部具有恆久藝術魅力的名作。

sentences.english: Fall is the artist. (Takayuki Ikkaku, Arisa Hosaka and Toshihiro Kawabata)
It was a similar story for the Toledo Museum of Art.
sentences.chinese: 對於託雷多藝術博物館來說，也是差不多的情況。

sentences.english: And it is this belief that leads us to include these arts in the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 正是這個觀點，我們將藝術襄括進了學校課程之中。

sentences.english: But this is perhaps a very simple example of ASCII art.
sentences.chinese: 這是字符藝術方面一個非常簡單的例子。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
